title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for July 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for July 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Maxime Sbaihi Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing a preview of the ECB meeting, and market outlook with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Netflix's post-earnings surge may be lost on FANG peers." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
